summary: A set of dark, black robes for your stylish and morally ambiguous lady characters!
descriptionHtml:
This is an outfit I custom made for one of my own characters, and I thought maybe someone else would like to use it as well. It's a re-texture of one of asianboy345's Tera armors fitted to the UNPK body. (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32540/?)

It's a standalone outfit (it doesn't replace anything) that you can buy at Radiant Raiments in Solitude, or you can craft it at a forge. This file only contains the robes- my character in the picture is wearing ebony boots and gauntlets with it.

**EDIT** some people have commented on the skirt being just a little too unrealistically large around the bottom, so I uploaded a newer version with the skirt and butt being a little smaller.

Apparently I forgot to add the textures to the panties- fixed it now! Just download the textures and drop to your Skyrim Data folder.

I also included a panties version, for those who don't like beautiful naked people.

The textures in this mod are compatible with all UNP family body types. This does NOT have TBBP/BBP on it.

INSTALLATION-

Drag and drop to your Skyrim Data folder, and you're done!

PERMISSIONS-

Do whatever you want. I don't care.

CREDITS-

dimon99 for the UNP body
asianboy345 for the original Tera armors this mesh is modified from
author: gooboo
